t: Bathroom Vanities - IKEA
s: If no upgrades are needed to your bathroom flooring, plumbing or tile work, a new bathroom sink vanity can go a long way to freshening up the whole look and feel of the space. Add a new shower curtain, bath mat and towels and your bathroom can feel brand new without breaking the bank.
